attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of money that an individual is allowed to claim from a company for business use of their own transport, free of income tax is £0.40 per mile for the first 10000 miles & £0.25 thereafter. This level was set when Petrol / diesel was £0.87 per litre,it is now £1.15 & rising. with insurance premium tax, plus extra duty it is about time that this level was reviewed to say £0.55 & £0.35 respectively

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
